allow:
Bash(powershell -NoProfile -Command '
Add-Type -Assembly System.IO.Compression.FileSystem
$file = ""c:\\Dev\\IllistrinWeb\\illistrinwebsite-main\\blogs\\Paul Skinnader - Development plans and a new home.docx""
$tempDir = ""$env:TEMP\\docx_extract_2""
if \(Test-Path $tempDir\) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force $tempDir }
New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $tempDir | Out-Null
[System.IO.Compression.ZipFile]::ExtractToDirectory\($file, $tempDir\)
[xml]$doc = Get-Content \(Join-Path $tempDir ""word\\document.xml""\) -Encoding UTF8
$ns = New-Object System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager\($doc.NameTable\)
$ns.AddNamespace\(""w"", ""http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/wordprocessingml/2006/main""\)
$paragraphs = $doc.SelectNodes\(""//w:p"", $ns\)
foreach \($p in $paragraphs\) {
    $texts = $p.SelectNodes\("".//w:t"", $ns\)
    $line = """"
    foreach \($t in $texts\) { $line += $t.InnerText }
    Write-Output $line
}
Remove-Item -Recurse -Force $tempDir
')
Bash(for f in about.html blog.html media.html teams.html policies.html contacts.html safeguarding.html calendar.html coaches.html news.html)
